00011 void
00012 YicesSolver::init()
00013 {
00014     if (available_linkage() & LM_EXECUTABLE) {
00015         linkage = LM_EXECUTABLE;
00016     } else if (available_linkage() & LM_LIBRARY) {
00017         linkage = LM_LIBRARY;
00018     } else {
00019         linkage = LM_NONE;
00020         ROSE_ASSERT(!"no available Yices linkage");
00021     }
00022 }
00023 
00024 YicesSolver::~YicesSolver() 
00025 {
00026 #ifdef ROSE_HAVE_LIBYICES
00027     if (context) {
00028         yices_del_context(context);
00029         context = NULL;
00030     }
00031 #endif
00032 }
00033 
00034 unsigned
00035 YicesSolver::available_linkage() const
00036 {
00037     unsigned retval = 0;
00038 #ifdef ROSE_HAVE_LIBYICES
00039     retval |= LM_LIBRARY;
00040 #endif
00041 #ifdef ROSE_YICES
00042     retval |= LM_EXECUTABLE;
00043 #endif
00044     return retval;
00045 }

00047 /* See YicesSolver.h */
00048 SMTSolver::Satisfiable
00049 YicesSolver::satisfiable(const std::vector<TreeNodePtr> &exprs)
00050 {
00051 #ifdef ROSE_HAVE_LIBYICES
00052     if (get_linkage() & LM_LIBRARY) {
00053 
00054         ++stats.ncalls;
00055         RTS_MUTEX(class_stats_mutex) {
00056             ++class_stats.ncalls;
00057         } RTS_MUTEX_END;
00058 
00059         if (!context) {
00060             context = yices_mk_context();
00061             assert(context);
00062         } else {
00063             yices_reset(context);
00064         }
00065 
00066 #ifndef NDEBUG
00067         yices_enable_type_checker(true);
00068 #endif
00069 
00070         Definitions defns;
00071         for (std::vector<TreeNodePtr>::const_iterator ei=exprs.begin(); ei!=exprs.end(); ++ei)
00072             ctx_define(*ei, &defns);
00073         for (std::vector<TreeNodePtr>::const_iterator ei=exprs.begin(); ei!=exprs.end(); ++ei)
00074             ctx_assert(*ei);
00075         switch (yices_check(context)) {
00076             case l_false: return SAT_NO;
00077             case l_true:  return SAT_YES;
00078             case l_undef: return SAT_UNKNOWN;
00079         }
00080         assert(!"switch statement is incomplete");
00081         abort();
00082     }
00083 #endif
00084 
00085     ROSE_ASSERT(get_linkage() & LM_EXECUTABLE);
00086     return SMTSolver::satisfiable(exprs);
00087 }

00090 /* See SMTSolver::get_command() */
00091 std::string
00092 YicesSolver::get_command(const std::string &config_name)
00093 {
00094 #ifdef ROSE_YICES
00095     ROSE_ASSERT(get_linkage() & LM_EXECUTABLE);
00096     return std::string(ROSE_YICES) + " --evidence --type-check " + config_name;
00097 #else
00098     return "false no yices command";
00099 #endif
00100 }

00102 /* See SMTSolver::generate_file() */
00103 void
00104 YicesSolver::generate_file(std::ostream &o, const std::vector<TreeNodePtr> &exprs, Definitions *defns)
00105 {
00106     ROSE_ASSERT(get_linkage() & LM_EXECUTABLE);
00107     Definitions *allocated = NULL;
00108     if (!defns)
00109         defns = allocated = new Definitions;
00110 
00111     for (std::vector<TreeNodePtr>::const_iterator ei=exprs.begin(); ei!=exprs.end(); ++ei)
00112         out_define(o, *ei, defns);
00113     for (std::vector<TreeNodePtr>::const_iterator ei=exprs.begin(); ei!=exprs.end(); ++ei)
00114         out_assert(o, *ei);
00115     o <<"\n(check)\n";
00116 
00117     delete allocated;
00118 }
00119 
00120 uint64_t
00121 YicesSolver::parse_variable(const char *nptr, char **endptr, char first_char)
00122 {
00123     uint64_t retval = (uint64_t)(-1);
00124     if (!nptr) {
00125         errno = EINVAL;
00126     } else {
00127         const char *s = nptr;
00128         while (isspace(*s)) ++s;
00129         if (first_char==*s && isdigit(s[1])) {
00130             errno = 0;
00131             uint64_t n = strtoull(s+1, endptr, 10);
00132             if (!errno)
00133                 retval = n;
00134         } else {
00135             if (endptr) *endptr = const_cast<char*>(nptr); // following standard strtoul() interface
00136             errno = EINVAL;
00137         }
00138     }
00139     return retval;
00140 }
00141 
00142 /* See SMTSolver::parse_evidence() */
00143 void
00144 YicesSolver::parse_evidence()
00145 {
00146     /* Look for text like "(= v36 0b01101111111111111101011110110100)" or
00147      * "(= (m95 0b01000000000000011100111111110100) 0b00000000000000000100111100000100)".  The text is free-form, with any
00148      * white space appearing in place of the SPC characters shown. */
00149     evidence.clear();
00150     const char *s = output_text.c_str();
00151     char *rest = NULL;
00152 
00153     struct Error {
00154         Error(const char *at, const std::string &mesg): at(at), mesg(mesg) {}
00155         const char *at;
00156         std::string mesg;
00157     };
00158 
00159     try {
00160         while (*s) {
00161             // "(= "
00162             while (isspace(*s)) ++s;
00163             if (!*s)
00164                 break;
00165             if ('('!=*s++)
00166                 throw Error(s-1, "left paren expected (1)");
00167             while (isspace(*s)) ++s;
00168             if ('='!=*s++)
00169                 throw Error(s-1, "'=' operator expected (2)");
00170             if (!isspace(*s++))
00171                 throw Error(s-1, "'=' operator expected (3)");
00172         
00173             // variable or function-apply
00174             while (isspace(*s)) ++s;
00175             if ('('==*s) {
00176                 ++s;
00177 
00178                 // memory variable, like "m95"
00179                 errno = 0;
00180                 (void) parse_variable(s, &rest, 'm');
00181                 if (errno || s==rest)
00182                     throw Error(s, "memory variable expected (5)");
00183                 s = rest;
00184 
00185                 // memory address, like 0b01000000000000011100111111110100
00186                 uint64_t addr = rose_strtoull(s, &rest, 0);
00187                 if (errno || s==rest)
00188                     throw Error(s, "memory address expected (6)");
00189                 s = rest;
00190 
00191                 // right paren
00192                 while (isspace(*s)) ++s;
00193                 if (')'!=*s++)
00194                     throw Error(s, "')' expected after memory address (7)");
00195 
00196                 // memory value
00197                 while (isspace(*s)) ++s;
00198                 if (0!=strncmp(s, "0b", 2) || !strchr("01", s[2]))
00199                     throw Error(s, "binary constant expected for memory value (8)");
00200                 s += 2;
00201                 uint64_t val = rose_strtoull(s, &rest, 2);
00202                 if (errno || s==rest)
00203                     throw Error(s, "memory value expected (9)");
00204                 size_t nbits = rest-s;
00205                 s = rest;
00206 
00207                 if (')'!=*s++)
00208                     throw Error(s-1, "')' expected at end of memory value (10)");
00209 
00210                 std::string addr_name = StringUtility::addrToString(addr);
00211                 assert(evidence.find(addr_name)==evidence.end());
00212                 evidence[addr_name] = std::pair<size_t, uint64_t>(nbits, val);
00213 
00214             } else {
00215                 // bitvector variable name
00216                 errno = 0;
00217                 uint64_t vnum = parse_variable(s, &rest, 'v');
00218                 if (errno || s==rest)
00219                     throw Error(s, "bitvector variable expected (11)");
00220                 s = rest;
00221 
00222                 // bitvector value
00223                 while (isspace(*s)) ++s;
00224                 if (0!=strncmp(s, "0b", 2) || !strchr("01", s[2]))
00225                     throw Error(s, "binary constant expected for bitvector variable (12)");
00226                 s += 2;
00227                 uint64_t val = rose_strtoull(s, &rest, 2);
00228                 if (errno || s==rest)
00229                     throw Error(s, "bitvector value expected (13)");
00230                 size_t nbits = rest-s;
00231                 s = rest;
00232 
00233                 char vname[64];
00234                 snprintf(vname, sizeof vname, "v%"PRIu64, vnum);
00235                 assert(evidence.find(vname)==evidence.end());
00236                 evidence[vname] = std::pair<size_t, uint64_t>(nbits, val);
00237             }
00238 
00239             // ')' closing the '=' operator
00240             if (')'!=*s++)
00241                 throw Error(s-1, "expected ')' to close '=' operator (14)");
00242         }
00243         
00244     } catch (const Error &err) {
00245         std::cerr <<"YicesSolver::parse_evidence: " <<err.mesg <<" at char position " <<(err.at-output_text.c_str()) <<"\n"
00246                   <<"YicesSolver::parse_evidence: before \"" <<std::string(err.at).substr(0, 20) <<"\"...\n"
00247                   <<"YicesSolver::parse_evidence: entire evidence string follows...\n"
00248                   <<output_text.c_str();
00249     }
00250 }
00251 
00252 std::vector<std::string>
00253 YicesSolver::evidence_names()
00254 {
00255     std::vector<std::string> retval;
00256     for (Evidence::const_iterator ei=evidence.begin(); ei!=evidence.end(); ++ei)
00257         retval.push_back(ei->first);
00258     return retval;
00259 }
00260 
00261 TreeNodePtr
00262 YicesSolver::evidence_for_name(const std::string &name)
00263 {
00264     Evidence::const_iterator found = evidence.find(name);
00265     if (found==evidence.end())
00266         return TreeNodePtr(); // null
00267     return LeafNode::create_integer(found->second.first/*nbits*/, found->second.second/*value*/);
00268 }

00270 void
00271 YicesSolver::clear_evidence()
00272 {
00273     evidence.clear();
00274 }
00275 
00277 void
00278 YicesSolver::out_define(std::ostream &o, const TreeNodePtr &tn, Definitions *defns)
00279 {
00280     assert(defns);
00281     LeafNodePtr ln = tn->isLeafNode();
00282     InternalNodePtr in = tn->isInternalNode();
00283 
00284     if (ln && ln->is_variable()) {
00285         if (defns->find(ln->get_name())==defns->end()) {
00286             defns->insert(ln->get_name());
00287             o <<"(define v" <<ln->get_name() <<"::(bitvector " <<ln->get_nbits() <<"))\n";
00288         }
00289     } else if (ln && ln->is_memory()) {
00290         if (defns->find(ln->get_name())==defns->end()) {
00291             defns->insert(ln->get_name());
00292             o <<"(define m" <<ln->get_name() <<"::(-> (bitvector 32) (bitvector " <<ln->get_nbits() <<")))\n";
00293         }
00294     } else if (in) {
00295         for (size_t i=0; i<in->size(); i++)
00296             out_define(o, in->child(i), defns);
00297     }
00298 }
00299 
00301 void
00302 YicesSolver::out_assert(std::ostream &o, const TreeNodePtr &tn)
00303 {
00304     o <<"(assert ";
00305     out_expr(o, tn);
00306     o <<")\n";
00307 }

00310 void
00311 YicesSolver::out_number(std::ostream &o, const TreeNodePtr &tn)
00312 {
00313     LeafNodePtr ln = tn->isLeafNode();
00314     assert(ln && ln->is_known());
00315     o <<ln->get_value();
00316 }
00317 
00319 void
00320 YicesSolver::out_expr(std::ostream &o, const TreeNodePtr &tn)
00321 {
00322     using namespace InsnSemanticsExpr;
00323     LeafNodePtr ln = tn->isLeafNode();
00324     InternalNodePtr in = tn->isInternalNode();
00325     if (ln) {
00326         if (ln->is_known()) {
00327             o <<"(mk-bv " <<ln->get_nbits() <<" " <<ln->get_value() <<")";
00328         } else if (ln->is_memory()) {
00329             o <<"m" <<ln->get_name();
00330         } else {
00331             assert(ln->is_variable());
00332             o <<"v" <<ln->get_name();
00333         }
00334     } else {
00335         assert(in);
00336         switch (in->get_operator()) {
00337             case OP_ADD:        out_la(o, "bv-add", in, false);                 break;
00338             case OP_AND:        out_la(o, "and", in, true);                     break;
00339             case OP_ASR:        out_asr(o, in);                                 break;
00340             case OP_BV_AND:     out_la(o, "bv-and", in, true);                  break;
00341             case OP_BV_OR:      out_la(o, "bv-or", in, false);                  break;
00342             case OP_BV_XOR:     out_la(o, "bv-xor", in, false);                 break;
00343             case OP_EQ:         out_binary(o, "=", in);                         break;
00344             case OP_CONCAT:     out_la(o, "bv-concat", in);                     break;
00345             case OP_EXTRACT:    out_extract(o, in);                             break;
00346             case OP_INVERT:     out_unary(o, "bv-not", in);                     break;
00347             case OP_ITE:        out_ite(o, in);                                 break;
00348             case OP_LSSB:       throw Exception("OP_LSSB not implemented");
00349             case OP_MSSB:       throw Exception("OP_MSSB not implemented");
00350             case OP_NE:         out_binary(o, "/=", in);                        break;
00351             case OP_NEGATE:     out_unary(o, "bv-neg", in);                     break;
00352             case OP_NOOP:       o<<"0b1";                                       break;
00353             case OP_OR:         out_la(o, "or", in, false);                     break;
00354             case OP_READ:       out_read(o, in);                                break;
00355             case OP_ROL:        throw Exception("OP_ROL not implemented");
00356             case OP_ROR:        throw Exception("OP_ROR not implemented");
00357             case OP_SDIV:       throw Exception("OP_SDIV not implemented");
00358             case OP_SEXTEND:    out_sext(o, in);                                break;
00359             case OP_SLT:        out_binary(o, "bv-slt", in);                    break;
00360             case OP_SLE:        out_binary(o, "bv-sle", in);                    break;
00361             case OP_SHL0:       out_shift(o, "bv-shift-left", in, false);       break;
00362             case OP_SHL1:       out_shift(o, "bv-shift-left", in, true);        break;
00363             case OP_SHR0:       out_shift(o, "bv-shift-right", in, false);      break;
00364             case OP_SHR1:       out_shift(o, "bv-shift-right", in, true);       break;
00365             case OP_SGE:        out_binary(o, "bv-sge", in);                    break;
00366             case OP_SGT:        out_binary(o, "bv-sgt", in);                    break;
00367             case OP_SMOD:       throw Exception("OP_SMOD not implemented");
00368             case OP_SMUL:       out_mult(o, in);                                break;
00369             case OP_UDIV:       throw Exception("OP_UDIV not implemented");
00370             case OP_UEXTEND:    out_uext(o, in);                                break;
00371             case OP_UGE:        out_binary(o, "bv-ge", in);                     break;
00372             case OP_UGT:        out_binary(o, "bv-gt", in);                     break;
00373             case OP_ULE:        out_binary(o, "bv-le", in);                     break;
00374             case OP_ULT:        out_binary(o, "bv-lt", in);                     break;
00375             case OP_UMOD:       throw Exception("OP_UMOD not implemented");
00376             case OP_UMUL:       out_mult(o, in);                                break;
00377             case OP_WRITE:      out_write(o, in);                               break;
00378             case OP_ZEROP:      out_zerop(o, in);                               break;
00379         }
00380     }
00381 }

00384 void
00385 YicesSolver::out_unary(std::ostream &o, const char *opname, const InternalNodePtr &in)
00386 {
00387     assert(opname && *opname);
00388     assert(in && 1==in->size());
00389 
00390     o <<"(" <<opname <<" ";
00391     out_expr(o, in->child(0));
00392     o <<")";
00393 }
00394 
00396 void
00397 YicesSolver::out_binary(std::ostream &o, const char *opname, const InternalNodePtr &in)
00398 {
00399     assert(opname && *opname);
00400     assert(in && 2==in->size());
00401 
00402     o <<"(" <<opname <<" ";
00403     out_expr(o, in->child(0));
00404     o <<" ";
00405     out_expr(o, in->child(1));
00406     o <<")";
00407 }
00408 
00419 void
00420 YicesSolver::out_ite(std::ostream &o, const InternalNodePtr &in)
00421 {
00422     assert(in && 3==in->size());
00423     assert(in->child(0)->get_nbits()==1);
00424     o <<"(ite (=";
00425     out_expr(o, in->child(0));
00426     o <<" 0b1)";
00427     for (size_t i=1; i<3; i++) {
00428         o <<" ";
00429         out_expr(o, in->child(i));
00430     }
00431     o <<")";
00432 }
00433 
00436 void
00437 YicesSolver::out_la(std::ostream &o, const char *opname, const InternalNodePtr &in, bool identity_element)
00438 {
00439     assert(opname && *opname);
00440     assert(in && in->size()>=1);
00441 
00442     for (size_t i=1; i<std::max((size_t)2, in->size()); i++)
00443         o <<"(" <<opname <<" ";
00444     out_expr(o, in->child(0));
00445 
00446     if (in->size()>1) {
00447         for (size_t i=1; i<in->size(); i++) {
00448             o <<" ";
00449             out_expr(o, in->child(i));
00450             o <<")";
00451         }
00452     } else {
00453         LeafNodePtr ident = LeafNode::create_integer(in->child(0)->get_nbits(), identity_element ? (uint64_t)(-1) : 0);
00454         out_expr(o, ident);
00455         o <<")";
00456     }
00457 }
00458 
00460 void
00461 YicesSolver::out_la(std::ostream &o, const char *opname, const InternalNodePtr &in)
00462 {
00463     if (in->size()==1) {
00464         out_unary(o, opname, in);
00465     } else {
00466         out_la(o, opname, in, false);
00467     }
00468 }
00469 
00471 void
00472 YicesSolver::out_extract(std::ostream &o, const InternalNodePtr &in)
00473 {
00474     assert(in && 3==in->size());
00475     assert(in->child(0)->is_known());
00476     assert(in->child(1)->is_known());
00477     assert(in->child(0)->get_value() < in->child(1)->get_value());
00478     size_t lo = in->child(0)->get_value();
00479     size_t hi = in->child(1)->get_value() - 1;          /*inclusive*/
00480     o <<"(bv-extract " <<hi <<" " <<lo <<" ";
00481     out_expr(o, in->child(2));
00482     o <<")";
00483 }
00484 
00488 void
00489 YicesSolver::out_sext(std::ostream &o, const InternalNodePtr &in)
00490 {
00491     assert(in && 2==in->size());
00492     assert(in->child(0)->is_known()); /*Yices bv-sign-extend needs a number for the second operand*/
00493     assert(in->child(0)->get_value() > in->child(1)->get_nbits());
00494     size_t extend_by = in->child(0)->get_value() - in->child(1)->get_nbits();
00495     o <<"(bv-sign-extend  ";
00496     out_expr(o, in->child(1)); /*vector*/
00497     o <<" " <<extend_by <<")";
00498 }
00499 
00504 void
00505 YicesSolver::out_uext(std::ostream &o, const InternalNodePtr &in)
00506 {
00507     using namespace InsnSemanticsExpr;
00508     assert(in && 2==in->size());
00509     assert(in->child(0)->is_known()); /*Yices mk-bv needs a number for the size operand*/
00510     assert(in->child(0)->get_value() > in->child(1)->get_nbits());
00511     size_t extend_by = in->child(0)->get_value() - in->child(1)->get_nbits();
00512 
00513     o <<"(bv-concat (mk-bv " <<extend_by <<" 0) ";
00514     out_expr(o, in->child(1));
00515     o <<")";
00516 }
00517 
00519 void
00520 YicesSolver::out_shift(std::ostream &o, const char *opname, const InternalNodePtr &in,
00521                        bool newbits)
00522 {
00523     assert(opname && *opname);
00524     assert(in && 2==in->size());
00525     assert(in->child(0)->is_known()); /*Yices' bv-shift-* operators need a constant for the shift amount*/
00526 
00527     o <<"(" <<opname <<(newbits?"1":"0") <<" ";
00528     out_expr(o, in->child(1));
00529     o <<" " <<in->child(0)->get_value() <<")";
00530 }
00531 
00541 void
00542 YicesSolver::out_asr(std::ostream &o, const InternalNodePtr &in)
00543 {
00544     assert(in && 2==in->size());
00545     TreeNodePtr vector = in->child(1);
00546     uint64_t vector_size = vector->get_nbits();
00547     assert(in->child(0)->is_known());
00548     uint64_t shift_amount = in->child(0)->get_value();
00549 
00550     o <<"(ite (= (mk-bv 1 1) (bv-extract " <<(vector_size-1) <<" " <<(vector_size-1) <<" ";
00551     out_expr(o, vector);
00552     o <<")) (bv-shift-right1 ";
00553     out_expr(o, vector);
00554     o <<" " <<shift_amount <<") (bv-shift-right0 ";
00555     out_expr(o, vector);
00556     o <<" " <<shift_amount <<"))";
00557 }
00558 
00569 void
00570 YicesSolver::out_zerop(std::ostream &o, const InternalNodePtr &in)
00571 {
00572     assert(in && 1==in->size());
00573     o <<"(ite (= (mk-bv " <<in->child(0)->get_nbits() <<" 0) ";
00574     out_expr(o, in->child(0));
00575     o <<") 0b1 0b0)";
00576 }
00577 
00585 void
00586 YicesSolver::out_mult(std::ostream &o, const InternalNodePtr &in)
00587 {
00588     o <<"(bv-mul (bv-sign-extend ";
00589     out_expr(o, in->child(0));
00590     o <<" " <<(in->child(1)->get_nbits()-1) <<") (bv-sign-extend ";
00591     out_expr(o, in->child(1));
00592     o <<" " <<(in->child(0)->get_nbits()-1) <<"))";
00593 }
00594 
00596 void
00597 YicesSolver::out_write(std::ostream &o, const InternalNodePtr &in)
00598 {
00599     o <<"(update ";
00600     out_expr(o, in->child(0));  // previous memory state
00601     o <<" (";
00602     out_expr(o, in->child(1));  // address to which we are writing
00603     o <<") ";
00604     out_expr(o, in->child(2));  // value we are writing
00605     o <<")";
00606 }
00607 
00609 void
00610 YicesSolver::out_read(std::ostream &o, const InternalNodePtr &in)
00611 {
00612     o <<"(";
00613     out_expr(o, in->child(0));  // memory state from which we are reading
00614     o <<" ";
00615     out_expr(o, in->child(1));  // address from which we are reading
00616     o <<")";
00617 }
00618 
00619 #ifdef ROSE_HAVE_LIBYICES
00620 
00621 void
00622 YicesSolver::ctx_define(const TreeNodePtr &tn, Definitions *defns)
00623 {
00624     assert(defns);
00625     LeafNodePtr ln = tn->isLeafNode();
00626     InternalNodePtr in = tn->isInternalNode();
00627 
00628     if (ln && ln->is_variable()) {
00629         if (defns->find(ln->get_name())==defns->end()) {
00630             defns->insert(ln->get_name());
00631             yices_type bvtype = yices_mk_bitvector_type(context, ln->get_nbits());
00632             assert(bvtype);
00633             char name[64];
00634             snprintf(name, sizeof name, "v%"PRIu64, ln->get_name());
00635             yices_var_decl vdecl = yices_mk_var_decl(context, name, bvtype);
00636             assert(vdecl);
00637         }
00638     } else if (ln && ln->is_memory()) {
00639         if (defns->find(ln->get_name())==defns->end()) {
00640             defns->insert(ln->get_name());
00641             yices_type domain = yices_mk_bitvector_type(context, 32);
00642             yices_type range = yices_mk_bitvector_type(context, ln->get_nbits());
00643             yices_type ftype = yices_mk_function_type(context, &domain, 1, range);
00644             assert(ftype);
00645             char name[64];
00646             snprintf(name, sizeof name, "m%"PRIu64, ln->get_name());
00647             yices_var_decl vdecl = yices_mk_var_decl(context, name, ftype);
00648             assert(vdecl);
00649         }
00650     } else if (in) {
00651         for (size_t i=0; i<in->size(); i++)
00652             ctx_define(in->child(i), defns);
00653     }
00654 }
00655 #endif
00656 
00657 #ifdef ROSE_HAVE_LIBYICES
00658 
00659 void
00660 YicesSolver::ctx_assert(const TreeNodePtr &tn)
00661 {
00662     yices_expr e = ctx_expr(tn);
00663     assert(e);
00664     yices_assert(context, e);
00665 }
00666 #endif
00667 
00668 #ifdef ROSE_HAVE_LIBYICES
00669 
00670 yices_expr
00671 YicesSolver::ctx_expr(const TreeNodePtr &tn)
00672 {
00673     yices_expr retval = 0;
00674     using namespace InsnSemanticsExpr;
00675     LeafNodePtr ln = tn->isLeafNode();
00676     InternalNodePtr in = tn->isInternalNode();
00677     if (ln) {
00678         if (ln->is_known()) {
00679             retval = yices_mk_bv_constant(context, ln->get_nbits(), ln->get_value());
00680         } else {
00681             assert(ln->is_memory() || ln->is_variable());
00682             char name[64];
00683             sprintf(name, "%c%"PRIu64, ln->is_memory()?'m':'v', ln->get_name());
00684             yices_var_decl vdecl = yices_get_var_decl_from_name(context, name);
00685             assert(vdecl);
00686             retval = yices_mk_var_from_decl(context, vdecl);
00687         }
00688     } else {
00689         assert(in!=NULL);
00690         switch (in->get_operator()) {
00691             case OP_ADD:        retval = ctx_la(yices_mk_bv_add, in, false);            break;
00692             case OP_AND:        retval = ctx_la(yices_mk_and, in, true);                break;
00693             case OP_ASR:        retval = ctx_asr(in);                                   break;
00694             case OP_BV_AND:     retval = ctx_la(yices_mk_bv_and, in, true);             break;
00695             case OP_BV_OR:      retval = ctx_la(yices_mk_bv_or, in, false);             break;
00696             case OP_BV_XOR:     retval = ctx_la(yices_mk_bv_xor, in, false);            break;
00697             case OP_EQ:         retval = ctx_binary(yices_mk_eq, in);                   break;
00698             case OP_CONCAT:     retval = ctx_la(yices_mk_bv_concat, in);                break;
00699             case OP_EXTRACT:    retval = ctx_extract(in);                               break;
00700             case OP_INVERT:     retval = ctx_unary(yices_mk_bv_not, in);                break;
00701             case OP_ITE:        retval = ctx_ite(in);                                   break;
00702             case OP_LSSB:       throw Exception("OP_LSSB not implemented");
00703             case OP_MSSB:       throw Exception("OP_MSSB not implemented");
00704             case OP_NE:         retval = ctx_binary(yices_mk_diseq, in);                break;
00705             case OP_NEGATE:     retval = ctx_unary(yices_mk_bv_minus, in);              break;
00706             case OP_NOOP:       throw Exception("OP_NOOP not implemented");
00707             case OP_OR:         retval = ctx_la(yices_mk_or, in, false);                break;
00708             case OP_READ:       retval = ctx_read(in);                                  break;
00709             case OP_ROL:        throw Exception("OP_ROL not implemented");
00710             case OP_ROR:        throw Exception("OP_ROR not implemented");
00711             case OP_SDIV:       throw Exception("OP_SDIV not implemented");
00712             case OP_SEXTEND:    retval = ctx_sext(in);                                  break;
00713             case OP_SLT:        retval = ctx_binary(yices_mk_bv_slt, in);               break;
00714             case OP_SLE:        retval = ctx_binary(yices_mk_bv_sle, in);               break;
00715             case OP_SHL0:       retval = ctx_shift(yices_mk_bv_shift_left0, in);        break;
00716             case OP_SHL1:       retval = ctx_shift(yices_mk_bv_shift_left1, in);        break;
00717             case OP_SHR0:       retval = ctx_shift(yices_mk_bv_shift_right0, in);       break;
00718             case OP_SHR1:       retval = ctx_shift(yices_mk_bv_shift_right1, in);       break;
00719             case OP_SGE:        retval = ctx_binary(yices_mk_bv_sge, in);               break;
00720             case OP_SGT:        retval = ctx_binary(yices_mk_bv_sgt, in);               break;
00721             case OP_SMOD:       throw Exception("OP_SMOD not implemented");
00722             case OP_SMUL:       retval = ctx_mult(in);                                  break;
00723             case OP_UDIV:       throw Exception("OP_UDIV not implemented");
00724             case OP_UEXTEND:    retval = ctx_uext(in);                                  break;
00725             case OP_UGE:        retval = ctx_binary(yices_mk_bv_ge, in);                break;
00726             case OP_UGT:        retval = ctx_binary(yices_mk_bv_gt, in);                break;
00727             case OP_ULE:        retval = ctx_binary(yices_mk_bv_le, in);                break;
00728             case OP_ULT:        retval = ctx_binary(yices_mk_bv_lt, in);                break;
00729             case OP_UMOD:       throw Exception("OP_UMOD not implemented");
00730             case OP_UMUL:       retval = ctx_mult(in);                                  break;
00731             case OP_WRITE:      retval = ctx_write(in);                                 break;
00732             case OP_ZEROP:      retval = ctx_zerop(in);                                 break;
00733         }
00734     }
00735     assert(retval);
00736     return retval;
00737 }
00738 #endif
00739 
00740 #ifdef ROSE_HAVE_LIBYICES
00741 /* Create Yices expression from unary ROSE expression. */
00742 yices_expr
00743 YicesSolver::ctx_unary(UnaryAPI f, const InternalNodePtr &in)
00744 {
00745     assert(f);
00746     assert(in && 1==in->size());
00747     yices_expr retval = (f)(context, ctx_expr(in->child(0)));
00748     assert(retval);
00749     return retval;
00750 }
00751 #endif
00752 
00753 #ifdef ROSE_HAVE_LIBYICES
00754 /* Create Yices epxression from binary ROSE expression. */
00755 yices_expr
00756 YicesSolver::ctx_binary(BinaryAPI f, const InternalNodePtr &in)
00757 {
00758     assert(f);
00759     assert(in && 2==in->size());
00760     yices_expr retval = (f)(context, ctx_expr(in->child(0)), ctx_expr(in->child(1)));
00761     assert(retval);
00762     return retval;
00763 }
00764 #endif
00765 
00766 #ifdef ROSE_HAVE_LIBYICES
00767 /* Create Yices expression for if-then-else operator. */
00768 yices_expr
00769 YicesSolver::ctx_ite(const InternalNodePtr &in)
00770 {
00771     assert(in && 3==in->size());
00772     assert(in->child(0)->get_nbits()==1);
00773     yices_expr cond = yices_mk_eq(context, ctx_expr(in->child(0)), yices_mk_bv_constant(context, 1, 1));
00774     yices_expr retval = yices_mk_ite(context, cond, ctx_expr(in->child(1)), ctx_expr(in->child(2)));
00775     assert(retval);
00776     return retval;
00777 }
00778 #endif
00779 
00780 #ifdef ROSE_HAVE_LIBYICES
00781 /* Create Yices expression for left-associative, binary operators. The @p identity is sign-extended and used as the
00782  * second operand if only one operand is supplied. */
00783 yices_expr
00784 YicesSolver::ctx_la(BinaryAPI f, const InternalNodePtr &in, bool identity)
00785 {
00786     assert(f);
00787     assert(in && in->size()>=1);
00788 
00789     yices_expr retval = ctx_expr(in->child(0));
00790 
00791     for (size_t i=1; i<in->size(); i++) {
00792         retval = (f)(context, retval, ctx_expr(in->child(i)));
00793         assert(retval);
00794     }
00795     
00796     if (1==in->size()) {
00797         yices_expr ident = yices_mk_bv_constant(context, 1, identity ? (uint64_t)(-1) : 0);
00798         retval = (f)(context, retval, ident);
00799         assert(retval);
00800     }
00801     
00802     return retval;
00803 }
00804 #endif
00805 
00806 #ifdef ROSE_HAVE_LIBYICES
00807 yices_expr
00808 YicesSolver::ctx_la(NaryAPI f, const InternalNodePtr &in, bool identity)
00809 {
00810     assert(f);
00811     assert(in && in->size()>=1);
00812     yices_expr *operands = new yices_expr[in->size()];
00813     for (size_t i=0; i<in->size(); i++) {
00814         operands[i] = ctx_expr(in->child(i));
00815         assert(operands[i]);
00816     }
00817     yices_expr retval = (f)(context, operands, in->size());
00818     assert(retval);
00819     delete[] operands;
00820     return retval;
00821 }
00822 #endif
00823 
00824 #ifdef ROSE_HAVE_LIBYICES
00825 yices_expr
00826 YicesSolver::ctx_la(BinaryAPI f, const InternalNodePtr &in)
00827 {
00828     assert(in->size()>1);
00829     return ctx_la(f, in, false);
00830 }
00831 #endif
00832 
00833 #ifdef ROSE_HAVE_LIBYICES
00834 
00835 yices_expr
00836 YicesSolver::ctx_extract(const InternalNodePtr &in)
00837 {
00838     assert(in && 3==in->size());
00839     assert(in->child(0)->is_known());
00840     assert(in->child(1)->is_known());
00841     assert(in->child(0)->get_value() < in->child(1)->get_value());
00842     size_t lo = in->child(0)->get_value();
00843     size_t hi = in->child(1)->get_value() - 1; /*inclusive*/
00844     yices_expr retval = yices_mk_bv_extract(context, hi, lo, ctx_expr(in->child(2)));
00845     assert(retval);
00846     return retval;
00847 }
00848 #endif
00849 
00850 #ifdef ROSE_HAVE_LIBYICES
00851 
00854 yices_expr
00855 YicesSolver::ctx_sext(const InternalNodePtr &in)
00856 {
00857     assert(in && 2==in->size());
00858     assert(in->child(0)->is_known());
00859     assert(in->child(0)->get_value() > in->child(1)->get_nbits());
00860     unsigned extend_by = in->child(0)->get_value() - in->child(1)->get_nbits();
00861     yices_expr retval = yices_mk_bv_sign_extend(context, ctx_expr(in->child(1)), extend_by);
00862     assert(retval);
00863     return retval;
00864 }
00865 #endif
00866 
00867 #ifdef ROSE_HAVE_LIBYICES
00868 
00872 yices_expr
00873 YicesSolver::ctx_uext(const InternalNodePtr &in)
00874 {
00875     assert(in && 2==in->size());
00876     assert(in->child(0)->is_known()); /*Yices mk-bv needs a number for the size operand*/
00877     assert(in->child(0)->get_value() > in->child(1)->get_nbits());
00878     size_t extend_by = in->child(0)->get_value() - in->child(1)->get_nbits();
00879     yices_expr retval = yices_mk_bv_concat(context,
00880                                            yices_mk_bv_constant(context, extend_by, 0),
00881                                            ctx_expr(in->child(1)));
00882     assert(retval);
00883     return retval;
00884 }
00885 #endif
00886 
00887 #ifdef ROSE_HAVE_LIBYICES
00888 
00889 yices_expr
00890 YicesSolver::ctx_shift(ShiftAPI f, const InternalNodePtr &in)
00891 {
00892     assert(in && 2==in->size());
00893     assert(in->child(0)->is_known()); /*Yices' bv-shift-* operators need a constant for the shift amount*/
00894     unsigned shift_amount = in->child(0)->get_value();
00895     yices_expr retval = (f)(context, ctx_expr(in->child(1)), shift_amount);
00896     assert(retval);
00897     return retval;
00898 }
00899 #endif
00900 
00901 #ifdef ROSE_HAVE_LIBYICES
00902 
00911 yices_expr
00912 YicesSolver::ctx_asr(const InternalNodePtr &in)
00913 {
00914     assert(in && 2==in->size());
00915     TreeNodePtr vector = in->child(1);
00916     unsigned vector_size = vector->get_nbits();
00917     assert(in->child(0)->is_known());
00918     unsigned shift_amount = in->child(0)->get_value();
00919     yices_expr retval = yices_mk_ite(context, 
00920                                      yices_mk_eq(context, 
00921                                                  yices_mk_bv_constant(context, 1, 1), 
00922                                                  yices_mk_bv_extract(context, vector_size-1, vector_size-1, ctx_expr(vector))),
00923                                      yices_mk_bv_shift_right1(context, ctx_expr(vector), shift_amount), 
00924                                      yices_mk_bv_shift_right0(context, ctx_expr(vector), shift_amount));
00925     assert(retval);
00926     return retval;
00927 }
00928 #endif
00929 
00930 #ifdef ROSE_HAVE_LIBYICES
00931 
00941 yices_expr
00942 YicesSolver::ctx_zerop(const InternalNodePtr &in)
00943 {
00944     assert(in && 1==in->size());
00945     yices_expr retval = yices_mk_ite(context,
00946                                      yices_mk_eq(context, 
00947                                                  yices_mk_bv_constant(context, in->child(0)->get_nbits(), 0), 
00948                                                  ctx_expr(in->child(0))), 
00949                                      yices_mk_bv_constant(context, 1, 1), 
00950                                      yices_mk_bv_constant(context, 1, 0));
00951     assert(retval);
00952     return retval;
00953 }
00954 #endif
00955 
00956 #ifdef ROSE_HAVE_LIBYICES
00957 
00964 yices_expr
00965 YicesSolver::ctx_mult(const InternalNodePtr &in)
00966 {
00967     yices_expr retval = yices_mk_bv_mul(context, 
00968                                         yices_mk_bv_sign_extend(context, ctx_expr(in->child(0)), in->child(1)->get_nbits()-1), 
00969                                         yices_mk_bv_sign_extend(context, ctx_expr(in->child(1)), in->child(0)->get_nbits()-1));
00970     assert(retval);
00971     return retval;
00972 }
00973 #endif
00974 
00975 #ifdef ROSE_HAVE_LIBYICES
00976 
00977 yices_expr
00978 YicesSolver::ctx_write(const InternalNodePtr &in)
00979 {
00980     yices_expr func = ctx_expr(in->child(0));
00981     yices_expr arg  = ctx_expr(in->child(1));
00982     yices_expr val  = ctx_expr(in->child(2));
00983     assert(func && arg && val);
00984     yices_expr retval = yices_mk_function_update(context, func, &arg, 1, val);
00985     assert(retval);
00986     return retval;
00987 }
00988 #endif
00989 
00990 #ifdef ROSE_HAVE_LIBYICES
00991 
00992 yices_expr
00993 YicesSolver::ctx_read(const InternalNodePtr &in)
00994 {
00995     yices_expr func = ctx_expr(in->child(0));
00996     yices_expr arg  = ctx_expr(in->child(1));
00997     assert(func && arg);
00998     yices_expr retval = yices_mk_app(context, func, &arg, 1);
00999     assert(retval);
01000     return retval;
01001 }
01002 #endif
